#summary Mockwire dependency

= Using the defaults =

The defaults include mockito, junit4, spring 2.5, fest assertions and logback for logging

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>net.stickycode.mockwire</groupId>
  <artifactId>mockwire-spring25</artifactId>
  <version>[1,2)</version>
  <type>jar</type>
  <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

You will need to add the StickyCodeRepository to you environment first. Hopefully i'll get around to pushing things into central soon.
